titleInfo.title: Data for "Physiological constraints on body size distributions in Crocodyliformes"

mods.abstract: These data were used to produce the figures and analyses presented in the paper by Gearty and Payne, published in 2019.
mods.note: Gearty, William and Payne, Jonathan L. (2019). Data for "Physiological constraints on body size distributions in Crocodyliformes". Stanford Digital Repository. Available at: https://purl.stanford.edu/fd595ms6824
Gearty, William, and Jonathan L. Payne. 2020. "Physiological constraints on body size distributions in crocodyliformes." Evolution. https://doi.org/10.1111/evo.13901
mods.accessCondition: User agrees that, where applicable, content will not be used to identify or to otherwise infringe the privacy or confidentiality rights of individuals. Content distributed via the Stanford Digital Repository may be subject to additional license and use restrictions applied by the depositor.
